canonical_explanation.text: Good habits keep us healthy and happy. Personal hygiene means keeping our body clean by brushing teeth, bathing, washing hands, and combing hair. Safety habits protect us from danger - we should look both ways before crossing the road and not talk to strangers. Good manners like saying please, thank you, and sorry make us nice. Healthy habits include eating good food, drinking water, exercising, and sleeping on time.
rules: Brush teeth twice a day, morning and night.
Wash hands before eating and after using the toilet.
Look both ways before crossing the road.
Say please, thank you, and sorry.
Eat healthy food, drink water, and sleep on time.

questions.question_text: How many times should we brush our teeth every day?
questions.explanation_correct: We should brush our teeth twice a day to keep them clean and healthy. Brushing in the morning and before going to bed is important to remove food and germs that can cause cavities and other problems.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Brushing your teeth only once a day is not enough to keep them clean. We need to brush twice a day, once in the morning and once before bed, to make sure we remove all the food and germs that can cause cavities and make our teeth unhealthy. Brushing three times a day is also good, but twice a day is the minimum to keep our teeth healthy.

questions.question_text: When should we wash our hands?
questions.explanation_correct: We should wash our hands before eating because that helps keep our food clean and safe to eat. Washing hands removes any germs or dirt that could make us sick if we eat with dirty hands.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not wait until night to wash our hands, or only wash them on Sundays. Washing hands before eating is important to keep our food and body clean and healthy. We should wash our hands regularly, especially before eating, to remove germs and dirt that could make us sick.

questions.question_text: How often should we take a bath?
questions.explanation_correct: We should take a bath every day because it keeps our body clean and healthy. Bathing helps us remove dirt, germs, and bad smells from our skin, and this is important for staying healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Taking a bath only once a week or once a month is not enough to keep our body clean. Our body gets dirty every day from playing, eating, and other activities, so we need to bathe every day to wash away all the dirt and stay healthy.

questions.question_text: What should we use to keep our hair neat?
questions.explanation_correct: We should use a comb to keep our hair neat. Combing our hair helps remove tangles and keep it looking tidy and smooth.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Using water alone cannot keep our hair neat. Scissors are for cutting hair, not styling it. Not doing anything to our hair will leave it messy and untidy. The best way to keep our hair neat is by using a comb to brush through it and style it.

questions.question_text: Why should we keep our nails short?
questions.explanation_correct: We should keep our nails short to keep germs away. Germs can hide under long nails and make us sick. Cutting our nails short helps us stay clean and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Keeping our nails short is not just about looking pretty. It's actually an important habit to stay healthy. Long nails can collect germs and dirt, which can make us sick if we don't wash our hands properly. That's why it's better to keep our nails short, so we can stay clean and prevent getting sick.

questions.question_text: What should we do before crossing the road?
questions.explanation_correct: We should look both ways before crossing the road to make sure no cars are coming. This keeps us safe from getting hit by a car.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Running across the road is very dangerous because cars might not see you in time. Closing your eyes or talking to friends while crossing the road is also not safe, because you won't be able to see if any cars are coming. The best thing to do is to look left, then right, and then left again to make sure the road is clear before crossing.

questions.question_text: Should we talk to strangers?
questions.explanation_correct: No, we should not talk to strangers because it is not safe. Talking to people we don't know can be dangerous, so we should stay away from strangers.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Talking to strangers can be unsafe. We should not talk to people we don't know because they might try to hurt us or take us away from our family. The right thing to do is to stay away from strangers and only talk to people we know, like our parents or teachers.

questions.question_text: Should we play with fire?
questions.explanation_correct: No, we should not play with fire. Fire can be very dangerous and can hurt us. It's important to stay away from fire so we don't get burned.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Playing with fire is not a good idea. Fire can be very hot and can burn our skin. It's important to be careful around fire and not touch it, because it can be very dangerous. The correct answer is 'No', we should not play with fire.

questions.question_text: What do we say when we ask for something?
questions.explanation_correct: We say 'please' when we ask for something. This is a good habit because it shows we are being polite and respectful when we want something from others.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'please'. We should not say 'give me' or 'I want' when asking for something, as that would be rude. Instead, we should use the magic word 'please' to be kind and polite. Saying 'now' is also not the right way to ask for something.

questions.question_text: What do we say when someone gives us something?
questions.explanation_correct: We say 'Thank you' when someone gives us something because it's a polite and kind thing to do. It shows the person that we appreciate their gift or kindness.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'Thank you'. We don't say 'OK' because that's not very polite. We also don't say 'More' or 'Give me more' because that would be rude and selfish. The right thing to say is 'Thank you' to show the person that we are grateful for what they have given us.

questions.question_text: What do we say when we make a mistake?
questions.explanation_correct: When we make a mistake, we say 'sorry' to show that we feel bad about it and to apologize. Saying 'sorry' is the polite and kind thing to do.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'sorry'. We don't say 'nothing' because that would be rude. We also don't say 'OK' or 'go away' because those don't show that we feel bad about the mistake. Saying 'sorry' is the best way to handle a mistake and be a good, kind friend.

questions.question_text: What type of food should we eat?
questions.explanation_correct: We should eat healthy food like fruits, vegetables, and whole grains. Healthy food gives us energy and helps us grow strong and big.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not eat only chips or candy because they are junk food. Junk food does not have the vitamins and minerals our body needs to stay healthy. Eating healthy food like fruits and vegetables is important for our growth and development.

questions.question_text: How many hours should children sleep?
questions.explanation_correct: Children should sleep 8-10 hours every night. This helps their bodies and brains grow big and strong. Sleeping well keeps them healthy and happy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Children should not sleep only 2 or 4 hours. That is not enough sleep for them to grow properly. They also should not sleep all day - they need to be awake and active for part of the day. The right amount of sleep for children is 8-10 hours every night.

questions.question_text: What should we drink plenty of?
questions.explanation_correct: We should drink plenty of water because it keeps our body healthy and clean. Water helps us stay hydrated and energetic throughout the day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cold drinks, coffee, and tea are not as healthy as water. Water is the best drink for us because it doesn't have any sugar or other chemicals. Drinking lots of water helps our body work properly and stay strong.

questions.question_text: You just came back from playing outside. What should you do?
questions.explanation_correct: After playing outside, you should wash your hands and face to clean off any dirt or germs. This helps keep you healthy and prevent getting sick.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should not eat food immediately after playing outside. First, you need to wash your hands and face to clean off any dirt or germs. This will help keep you healthy. Watching TV or going to sleep right away is also not a good idea, as you should first clean up and then rest or do other activities.

questions.question_text: You want to cross the road. What should you do?

options.text: Hold an adult's hand and look both ways

questions.explanation_correct: You should hold an adult's hand and look both ways before crossing the road. This keeps you safe from cars and other vehicles that could hit you if you run across without looking.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should never run across the road quickly or with your eyes closed. This is very dangerous because you might not see the cars coming and could get hit. You need to be careful and make sure it is safe to cross before you walk across the road.

questions.question_text: Your friend wants to play with your toy. What should you do?
questions.explanation_correct: You should share your toy with your friend. This is a good habit because sharing makes your friend happy and helps you make new friends. Sharing is a kind thing to do.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should not say no and hide the toy or break the toy. This is not a good habit because it would make your friend sad. You also should not run away, because that is not nice. The best thing to do is to share the toy with your friend.

questions.question_text: You feel tired and sleepy. What should you do?
questions.explanation_correct: When you feel tired and sleepy, the best thing to do is go to sleep. Sleeping helps your body rest and recharge so you have energy to play and learn the next day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating more sweets, watching TV all night, or playing video games will not help you feel less tired. These things may actually make you feel more tired and sleepy. The correct thing to do is to go to sleep so your body can rest and you can feel energized again.

questions.question_text: You find some matches. What should you do?
questions.explanation_correct: You should tell an adult if you find matches. Matches can be dangerous for young children to play with. It's important to keep yourself safe by letting a grown-up know about the matches so they can handle them properly.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should not play with the matches or hide them. Matches can start fires and cause accidents. The best thing to do is tell an adult right away so they can take care of the matches safely. This way, you and your friends won't get hurt.

questions.question_text: After using the toilet, what should you do?
questions.explanation_correct: You should wash your hands with soap after using the toilet. This is important to keep germs and dirt from spreading and getting you sick. Washing your hands helps keep you healthy and clean.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should not just do nothing after using the toilet. That would be unhygienic and could spread germs. You also should not go to sleep or eat food immediately after using the toilet. The correct thing to do is to wash your hands with soap and water to clean off any dirt or germs from using the toilet.

questions.question_text: Should we push others in a queue?
questions.explanation_correct: No, we should not push others in a queue. Pushing others is rude and can hurt them. We should wait patiently in the queue and take our turn.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Pushing others in a queue is not a good habit. Pushing can make the other people angry and they may get hurt. We should always be kind and polite to others, and wait for our turn patiently in the queue.

questions.question_text: You accidentally bump into someone. What do you say?
questions.explanation_correct: When you accidentally bump into someone, you should say 'Sorry'. This is a good habit because it shows you are polite and did not mean to hurt the other person. Being polite and saying sorry makes the other person feel better.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Option A 'Nothing' is not correct because you should always apologize if you accidentally bump into someone. Option C 'Go away' is rude and not a good habit. Option D 'OK' does not apologize for your mistake. The best option is B 'Sorry' because it shows you are being kind and considerate to the other person.

questions.question_text: Playing outside every day is ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Playing outside every day is good for your health. When you play outside, you get fresh air and exercise, which helps your body stay strong and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Playing outside every day is not a waste of time or boring. It is important to get fresh air and exercise every day to keep your body healthy and strong. Playing outside helps you stay active and have fun.

questions.question_text: Should we run on the stairs?
questions.explanation_correct: No, we should not run on the stairs. Running on the stairs can be dangerous and cause us to slip or fall, which can hurt us. It's better to walk slowly and carefully on the stairs to stay safe.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Running on the stairs is not a good idea. We can easily slip and fall, which can make us get hurt. It's important to walk slowly and hold the handrail when going up or down the stairs. This way, we can stay safe and avoid any accidents.

questions.question_text: How should we treat our elders?
questions.explanation_correct: We should treat our elders with respect because they are older and wiser than us. Elders have lots of experience and can teach us many things. Showing them respect by listening to them and being polite is the right way to behave.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not ignore, be rude, or shout at our elders. They deserve to be treated with kindness and respect. Elders have done a lot for us and we should be grateful to them. The correct way to treat elders is by speaking to them politely, listening to them, and helping them if they need it.

questions.question_text: Eating too many sweets is ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Eating too many sweets is bad for teeth because the sugar in sweets can damage your teeth and cause cavities. Too many sweets are not good for your health.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating too many sweets is not good for your health. Sweets have a lot of sugar, and too much sugar can hurt your teeth and make you sick. The best habit is to eat healthy foods like fruits and vegetables instead of too many sweets.

questions.question_text: Why do we brush our teeth?

options.text: To keep them clean and healthy

questions.explanation_correct: We brush our teeth to keep them clean and healthy. Brushing helps remove food and germs from our teeth, which keeps them strong and prevents cavities.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Brushing our teeth does not make them dirty. In fact, it is important to brush our teeth regularly to keep them clean and healthy. Eating too many sweets can be bad for our teeth, so we should not brush our teeth just to eat more sweets.

questions.question_text: A stranger offers you candy. What should you do?

options.text: Say no and tell your parents

questions.explanation_correct: You should say no and tell your parents. Strangers can be dangerous, so it's best to not take anything from them. Your parents can help keep you safe.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should not take the candy or go with the stranger. Strangers can be unsafe, and you should never go with someone you don't know. The best thing to do is to say no and tell your parents right away so they can help keep you safe.

questions.question_text: Sitting and standing with a straight back is ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Sitting and standing with a straight back is good posture. Good posture helps your body stay strong and healthy. It keeps your spine straight and makes it easier to move around and do activities.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Sitting and standing with a straight back is not bad or tiring. It is actually the best way to keep your body healthy and strong. Good posture helps your spine stay straight and makes it easier to move around and do your favorite activities without getting tired.

questions.question_text: What should we do when someone is talking?

options.text: Listen quietly and wait for our turn

questions.explanation_correct: We should listen quietly and wait for our turn when someone is talking. This is a good habit because it shows respect and helps us understand what the other person is saying.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not talk over someone or shout when they are talking. That would be rude and make it hard for us to hear them. We also should not walk away, because that would be impolite. The right thing to do is to listen quietly and wait patiently for our turn to speak.

questions.question_text: We should brush our teeth twice a day.
questions.explanation_correct: It's important to brush our teeth twice a day to keep them clean and healthy. Brushing in the morning and before bed helps remove food and germs from our teeth.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should brush your teeth twice a day, not just once. Brushing morning and night is the best way to keep your teeth and gums healthy and clean. Brushing only once a day is not enough to remove all the food and germs that build up on your teeth.

questions.question_text: We should never wash our hands.
questions.explanation_correct: We should always wash our hands to keep them clean and remove germs. Washing our hands is an important part of good hygiene habits that help us stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It is not true that we should never wash our hands. Washing our hands is very important for staying clean and healthy. We should wash our hands before eating, after using the bathroom, and whenever they get dirty. Washing our hands helps remove germs that can make us sick.

questions.question_text: We should look both ways before crossing the road.
questions.explanation_correct: It is true that we should look both ways before crossing the road. This is a good safety habit because it helps us check for any cars or vehicles coming from either side before we cross. Looking both ways keeps us safe from getting hit by a car.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It would be wrong to say that we don't need to look both ways before crossing the road. Looking both ways is an important safety habit that helps us avoid accidents. We should always check for cars coming from the left and right before crossing the street, so we don't get hit by a vehicle.

questions.question_text: Playing with fire is safe.
questions.explanation_correct: Playing with fire is very dangerous. Fire can hurt you and cause big problems. It is never safe to play with fire.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fire can be fun to play with, but it is not safe at all. Fire can burn you and start big fires that can hurt people. You should never play with fire - it is very dangerous and you could get seriously hurt.

questions.question_text: We should say thank you when someone helps us.
questions.explanation_correct: It is correct to say 'thank you' when someone helps us. Saying 'thank you' is a good habit that shows we are grateful and polite.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It is not correct to not say 'thank you' when someone helps us. Saying 'thank you' is an important way to show we appreciate the help. We should always say 'thank you' to be kind and polite.

questions.question_text: It is okay to push others to go first.
questions.explanation_correct: It is not okay to push others to go first. That would be rude and could hurt someone. We should be kind and let others go first if we want to be good friends.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Pushing others is not a good habit. It is not nice to make others go first by pushing them. We should be polite and wait for our turn. This way, everyone will be happy and no one will get hurt.

questions.question_text: Eating fruits and vegetables is healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: Eating fruits and vegetables is healthy because they have lots of vitamins and minerals that help keep our body strong and growing well. Fruits and veggies are good for us and help us stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating unhealthy snacks like chips or candy is not as good for us as eating fruits and vegetables. Fruits and veggies have special nutrients that help our body work properly and stay healthy. We should try to eat more fruits and vegetables every day.

questions.question_text: We should sleep very late at night.
questions.explanation_correct: We should not sleep very late at night. It is important to get enough sleep, around 9-10 hours every night, so our body can rest and recharge. Sleeping late makes us feel tired in the morning and we cannot do our best in school or play.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some children may think it's okay to stay up late at night, but that is not a good habit. We need to sleep early, around 8 or 9 pm, so we can get up early and feel refreshed in the morning. Staying up late makes us feel sleepy and cranky the next day.

questions.question_text: We should tell our parents where we are going.
questions.explanation_correct: It is true that we should tell our parents where we are going. This is a good safety habit. Our parents can keep us safe if they know where we are.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It is not true that we should not tell our parents where we are going. Telling our parents where we are going is a good safety habit. This helps our parents keep us safe and know where we are.

questions.question_text: Dirty hands can make us sick.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, dirty hands can make us sick. Germs and bacteria can get on our hands when we touch dirty things. If we don't wash our hands, these germs can get into our body and make us sick.
questions.explanation_incorrect: No, dirty hands cannot make us sick. It's important to keep our hands clean by washing them with soap and water. Washing our hands helps remove germs and bacteria that can make us sick. Dirty hands can spread germs and lead to illnesses, so we should always wash our hands.

questions.question_text: We should ___ our teeth twice a day.
questions.explanation_correct: Brushing our teeth twice a day, once in the morning and once at night, helps keep our teeth clean and healthy. Brushing removes the food and germs that can cause cavities and make our teeth hurt.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'brush'. We should brush our teeth twice a day, once in the morning and once before bed, to keep them clean and healthy. Brushing removes the food and germs that can cause cavities and make our teeth hurt. We should not 'clean' or 'wash' our teeth, we should 'brush' them.

questions.question_text: We should wash our ___ before eating.
questions.explanation_correct: We should wash our hands before eating because our hands can have germs and dirt on them. Washing our hands with soap and water helps clean them and keeps us from getting sick when we eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer is 'hands'. We should wash our hands before eating to keep our food clean and make sure we don't get sick. Washing our face or our feet would not help us stay healthy before eating.

questions.question_text: We should take a ___ every day.
questions.explanation_correct: Taking a bath every day is a good habit that keeps our body clean and healthy. Bathing helps us wash off dirt, germs, and sweat from our skin so we stay fresh and prevent sickness.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'bath'. We should take a bath every day to keep our body clean. Brushing teeth or combing hair are also good habits, but they don't clean our whole body like a bath does. A bath is the best way to stay clean and healthy.

questions.question_text: Look both ___ before crossing the road.
questions.explanation_correct: Looking both ways before crossing the road is important because it helps us check for cars or other vehicles coming from either side. This keeps us safe and prevents accidents when we cross the street.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'ways'. We need to look both ways, meaning left and right, before crossing the road. This helps us see if any cars or vehicles are coming so we can cross safely. Looking only one way would not be enough to check for traffic from both directions.

questions.question_text: We say ___ when we ask for something.
questions.explanation_correct: We say 'please' when we ask for something because it is a polite way to request something from others. Using 'please' shows that we are being kind and considerate.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'please'. We should say 'please' when we want something, like asking for a toy or a snack. Saying 'please' is a good habit that shows we are being polite and respectful.

questions.question_text: We say ___ you when someone gives us something.
questions.explanation_correct: We say 'thank you' when someone gives us something because it's a polite way to show that we appreciate their kindness and are grateful for the gift or help.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'thank'. We should say 'thank you' when someone gives us something because it's a good habit to have good manners. 'Thank you' is the polite way to show that we are grateful and appreciate the kind gesture.

questions.question_text: We say ___ when we make a mistake.
questions.explanation_correct: The word 'sorry' is used when we make a mistake because it shows that we feel bad about what we did and want to apologize. Good manners like saying 'sorry' make us kind and help us have better relationships with others.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'sorry'. We say 'sorry' when we make a mistake to show that we feel bad about it and want to apologize. Other words like 'hello' or 'thank you' are not used in this case, as they don't express apology for a mistake.

questions.question_text: We should drink plenty of ___.
questions.explanation_correct: We should drink plenty of water because water is very important for our body. Water helps us stay healthy and feel good. Drinking water keeps us hydrated and helps our body work properly.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'water'. We should drink plenty of water, not other drinks like milk or juice. Water is the best drink for our body because it keeps us hydrated and healthy. Drinking too much of other drinks can be bad for us.

questions.question_text: We should ___ on time to stay healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: We should sleep on time to stay healthy. When we sleep, our body rests and gets the energy it needs to keep us strong and active during the day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'sleep'. Sleeping on time is important for our health. We should go to bed early and get enough sleep every night so our body can rest and recharge for the next day. Sleeping at the right time is a good habit that keeps us healthy.

questions.question_text: We should not talk to ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Talking to strangers can be dangerous. We should not talk to people we don't know because they might try to hurt us. Staying away from strangers is an important safety habit.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'strangers'. We should not talk to strangers because they are people we do not know. Talking to strangers can be unsafe, so it is important to stay away from them. The right answer must be given in the exact format 'strangers'.

questions.question_text: Playing and ___ every day keeps us healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: Exercise is the right answer because it keeps our body strong and healthy. When we exercise, it helps our muscles grow, our heart beat better, and our body stay fit and active.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'exercise'. Exercise means moving our body and doing activities like running, jumping, or playing sports. This keeps us healthy and strong. The other option, 'sleep', is important too, but it's not the right answer for this question.

questions.question_text: We should keep our ___ short and clean.
questions.explanation_correct: We should keep our nails short and clean because long and dirty nails can collect germs and make us sick. Trimming our nails regularly and washing our hands helps us stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'nails'. We should keep our nails short and clean, not our hair. Long and dirty nails can collect germs, so we need to trim them regularly and wash our hands to stay healthy.

questions.question_text: Put in order: Morning hygiene routine.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is Wake up, Brush teeth, Take bath. This is the right order because we need to wake up first, then brush our teeth to keep them clean, and finally take a bath to keep our whole body clean and fresh.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Take bath, Wake up, Brush teeth. This is wrong because we can't take a bath before we even wake up! We need to wake up first, then brush our teeth, and finally take a bath to complete our morning hygiene routine.

questions.question_text: Put in order: How to cross the road safely.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is 'Stop at the road, Look both ways, Cross carefully' because it is the safest way to cross the road. First, you need to stop at the edge of the road to make sure there are no cars coming. Then, you need to look left and right to check for any vehicles. Finally, you can cross the road carefully, keeping an eye out for any cars that might be coming.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be 'Look both ways, Cross carefully, Stop at the road'. This is not the safest way to cross the road because you need to first stop at the edge of the road before looking left and right. If you cross the road without stopping first, you might not see a car coming and could get hurt. The correct order is 'Stop at the road, Look both ways, Cross carefully'.

questions.question_text: Put in order: How to wash hands.
questions.explanation_correct: The right order to wash hands is to first wet your hands, then use soap to clean them, and finally rinse and dry them. This is important because the soap helps remove germs and dirt, and rinsing and drying your hands properly keeps them clean.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct order is to first wet your hands, then use soap to clean them, and finally rinse and dry them. Rinsing and drying your hands is important to remove all the soap and germs, so your hands are really clean. If you just use soap without rinsing and drying, some soap and dirt will still be left on your hands.

questions.question_text: Put in order: Nighttime routine.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is Have dinner, Brush teeth, Go to sleep. This is the right order because we need to eat dinner first, then brush our teeth to keep them clean, and then go to sleep so our body can rest and get ready for the next day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Brush teeth, Have dinner, Go to sleep. This is not correct because we need to have dinner first to get the energy and nutrients our body needs. Then we can brush our teeth to keep them healthy before going to sleep.

questions.question_text: Put in order: Asking for help politely.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is Say please, Ask for help, Say thank you. This is the polite way to ask for help. First, you say 'please' to be kind. Then you ask for help. Finally, you say 'thank you' to show appreciation.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Ask for help, Say please, Say thank you. This is not polite because you should always say 'please' before asking for help, and then say 'thank you' afterwards. The correct order is Say please, Ask for help, Say thank you.
